mapper.sql: MCHNT_CODE, MCHNT_NAME, INDUSTRY_TYPE, SHOP_CODE, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_ADDR, NVL(EVALUATE,0) as EVALUATE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, SOLD_COUNT, ACTIVE_EXPLAIN, DISTANCE
mapper.select: SELECT mi.MCHNT_ID, mi.MCHNT_CODE, mi.MCHNT_TYPE, mi.MCHNT_NAME, mi.SOLD_COUNT, mi.INS_ID, ii.INS_CODE FROM TB_MERCHANT_INF mi, TB_INS_INF ii WHERE ROWNUM=1 AND mi.DATA_STAT='0' AND ii.DATA_STAT='0' AND ii .INS_ID=mi.INS_ID AND mi.MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode}
SELECT product_code FROM VIEW_MERCHANT_ACTIVE_COMMODITY WHERE MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode} AND COMMODITY_STAT='1' AND ACTIVE_STAT='1' AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE AND END_TIME >= SYSDATE AND ROWNUM=1

SELECT selling_price as commodity_price, product_code, commodity_id as commodity_code, commodity_name, commodity_facevalue as commodity_amount, commodity_cost as commodity_price, commodity_stat as commodity_status, active_rule FROM VIEW_MERCHANT_ACTIVE_COMMODITY WHERE COMMODITY_STAT='1' AND ACTIVE_STAT='1' AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE AND END_TIME >= SYSDATE AND MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode}

SELECT active_id, selling_price as commodity_price, product_code, commodity_id as commodity_code, commodity_name, commodity_facevalue as commodity_amount, commodity_cost as commodity_price, commodity_stat as commodity_status, active_rule FROM VIEW_MERCHANT_ACTIVE_COMMODITY WHERE COMMODITY_STAT='1' AND ACTIVE_STAT='1' AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE AND END_TIME >= SYSDATE AND COMMODITY_ID=#{commodityId}

SELECT selling_price as commodity_price, product_code, commodity_id as commodity_code, commodity_name, commodity_facevalue as commodity_amount, commodity_cost as commodity_price, commodity_stat as commodity_status FROM VIEW_MERCHANT_ACTIVE_COMMODITY WHERE MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode} AND COMMODITY_ID=#{commodityCode} AND COMMODITY_STAT='1' AND ACTIVE_STAT='1' AND START_TIME <= SYSDATE AND END_TIME >= SYSDATE AND ROWNUM=1
SELECT mchnt_code, mchnt_name, shop_code, shop_name FROM VIEW_INS_MCHNT_SHOP_MANAGER WHERE MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode} AND SHOP_CODE=#{shopCode} AND ROWNUM=1

SELECT mchnt_code, mchnt_name, shop_code, shop_name, industry_type1 as industry_type, evaluate, sold_count, shop_addr, longitude, latitude, telephone FROM VIEW_INS_MCHNT_SHOP_MANAGER WHERE MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode} AND SHOP_CODE=#{shopCode} AND ROWNUM=1

SELECT
FROM
WHERE 1=1
AND DISTANCE <= #{distance}
ORDER BY SOLD_COUNT DESC,DISTANCE ASC,SHOP_CODE ASC
ORDER BY EVALUATE DESC,DISTANCE ASC,SHOP_CODE ASC
ORDER BY DISTANCE ASC,SHOP_CODE ASC

SELECT il.INTERFACE_PRIMARY_KEY AS TXN_FLOW_NO, il.DMS_RELATED_KEY AS SWT_FLOW_NO, il.MCHNT_CODE, m.MCHNT_NAME, il.SHOP_CODE, s.SHOP_NAME, il.TRANS_AMT AS TXN_AMOUNT, il.TRANS_ID, al.ACC_VALID_BAL AS BALANCE, il.CREATE_TIME, il.CREATE_TIME as TRANS_TIME FROM TB_INTFACE_TRANS_LOG_HIS il INNER JOIN TB_TRANS_LOG_HIS tl ON il.INTERFACE_PRIMARY_KEY=tl.DMS_RELATED_KEY INNER JOIN TB_ACCOUNT_LOG_HIS al ON tl.TXN_PRIMARY_KEY=al.TXN_PRIMARY_KEY LEFT JOIN TB_MERCHANT_INF m ON il.MCHNT_CODE=m.MCHNT_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_SHOP_INF s ON il.SHOP_CODE=s.SHOP_CODE WHERE il.RESP_CODE='00' AND il.TRANS_ST IN ('1','3','17') AND il.TRANS_ID=al.TRANS_ID AND tl.PRI_ACCT_NO=#{accountNo} AND tl.MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode} UNION ALL SELECT il.INTERFACE_PRIMARY_KEY AS TXN_FLOW_NO, il.DMS_RELATED_KEY AS SWT_FLOW_NO, il.MCHNT_CODE, m.MCHNT_NAME, il.SHOP_CODE, s.SHOP_NAME, il.TRANS_AMT AS TXN_AMOUNT, il.TRANS_ID, al.ACC_VALID_BAL AS BALANCE, il.CREATE_TIME, il.CREATE_TIME as TRANS_TIME FROM TB_INTFACE_TRANS_LOG1 il INNER JOIN TB_TRANS_LOG1 tl ON il.INTERFACE_PRIMARY_KEY=tl.DMS_RELATED_KEY INNER JOIN TB_ACCOUNT_LOG1 al ON tl.TXN_PRIMARY_KEY=al.TXN_PRIMARY_KEY LEFT JOIN TB_MERCHANT_INF m ON il.MCHNT_CODE=m.MCHNT_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_SHOP_INF s ON il.SHOP_CODE=s.SHOP_CODE WHERE il.RESP_CODE='00' AND il.TRANS_ST IN ('1','3','17') AND il.TRANS_ID=al.TRANS_ID AND tl.PRI_ACCT_NO=#{accountNo} AND tl.MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode} UNION ALL SELECT il.INTERFACE_PRIMARY_KEY AS TXN_FLOW_NO, il.DMS_RELATED_KEY AS SWT_FLOW_NO, il.MCHNT_CODE, m.MCHNT_NAME, il.SHOP_CODE, s.SHOP_NAME, il.TRANS_AMT AS TXN_AMOUNT, il.TRANS_ID, al.ACC_VALID_BAL AS BALANCE, il.CREATE_TIME, il.CREATE_TIME as TRANS_TIME FROM TB_INTFACE_TRANS_LOG2 il INNER JOIN TB_TRANS_LOG2 tl ON il.INTERFACE_PRIMARY_KEY=tl.DMS_RELATED_KEY INNER JOIN TB_ACCOUNT_LOG2 al ON tl.TXN_PRIMARY_KEY=al.TXN_PRIMARY_KEY LEFT JOIN TB_MERCHANT_INF m ON il.MCHNT_CODE=m.MCHNT_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_SHOP_INF s ON il.SHOP_CODE=s.SHOP_CODE WHERE il.RESP_CODE='00' AND il.TRANS_ST IN ('1','3','17') AND il.TRANS_ID=al.TRANS_ID AND tl.PRI_ACCT_NO=#{accountNo} AND tl.MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode} ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,TXN_FLOW_NO DESC
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_CODE=#{productCode}

SELECT m.*,mi.MCHNT_NAME,s.SHOP_NAME FROM TB_MERCHANT_MANAGER m, TB_MERCHANT_INF mi , TB_SHOP_INF s WHERE m.DATA_STAT='0' AND mi.DATA_STAT='0' AND s.DATA_STAT='0' AND m.MCHNT_ID=MI.MCHNT_ID AND m.SHOP_ID=S.SHOP_ID AND s.MCHNT_ID=MI.MCHNT_ID AND m.ROLE_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{roleType} || '%' AND s.SHOP_CODE=#{shopCode} AND mi.MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode}
